fields.name: Golden Bonsai
fields.description: A beautiful Golden Bonsai, 20years old. Come with care guide to ensure it looks its best for many years to come. Supplied in an authentic oriental square pot

fields.name: Pine Bonsai
fields.description: A pine Bonsai, approximately 15years, in a shallow round ceramic pot. This traditional style of Bonsai is still eye-catching and a statement piece for the home.

fields.name: Cherry Bonsai
fields.description: The Cherry Tree is a firm favourite with bonsai enthusiasts. Supplied in a ceramic pot, may not be in bloom at time of purchase.

fields.name: Jade Tree
fields.description: The Jade Tree or Crassula ovata can grow upto 2m tall. Easy to care for, the secret is not to overwater. Supplied in 12cm pot, approx 15cm tall.

fields.name: Bunny Ears Cactus
fields.description: The quirky Bunny Ears Cactus, or Opuntia microdasys, is an eye catching cactus. When you think of cacti, this is probably the fella you're thinking of. Supplied in a funky two-handled rough ceramic mug, it brings the heat into the home.

fields.name: The Snuggler
fields.description: Purely for decorative purposes, this plant cosy gives your plants a warm snuggly look. Gone are the days of plant pots, get wearable for your plants! Suitable for hand washing when needed, fits pots upto 12cm. Knitted with faux fur lining in neutral colours

fields.name: Peacelily, Botanical illustrational style
fields.description: Supplied in a bold black frame, makes a simple and effective piece of art

fields.name: Snake Snuggler
fields.description: This cosy gives the effect of a snake wrapped around the plant. This fits upto 15cm pots, and has a polyester filling to plump it out.

fields.name: Spider Plant
fields.description: Lush green varigated leaf varity, easy to care for. Allow to grow large for a statement asthetic. Works well with our hangers to improve the trailing effect from the offspring. Supplied in 12cm pot

fields.name: Snake Plant
fields.description: A very easy to care for plant that does not require bright light. Quite happy to grow in a low-light room our of direct sun

fields.name: Aloe Vera
fields.description: The Aloe Vera is well known for its health benefits. This attractive plant can provide more than just a Meditarian feel to your house

fields.name: Deals
fields.description: No deals available at present - but do keep checking!

fields.name: Sloth Hanger
fields.description: This cosy sloth can hold upto 3kg. Ideal in a nursery or even for those young at heart. Not suitable for outdoor use

fields.name: Branch Plant Display
fields.description: This branch comes with fixtures that can support up to 4 small plants, works well with trailing plants

fields.name: Moon Hanger
fields.description: This wooden hanger works best with trailing plants with upto 9cm plant pots

fields.name: Jellyfish Airplant Hangers
fields.description: These are perfect to display airplants. The lack of a need for soil or pots can leave you wondering how to display your airplants. Various colours supplied
